welcome_message_body: Welcome to Trabzon, where the Black Sea meets the lush green mountains. Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, stunning architecture, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Trabzon has to offer!

restaurants.name: Konak Çay Evi
restaurants.description: Konak Çay Evi is a turkish coffeehouse located in Trabzon.

restaurants.name: Berweuli Ala Carte
restaurants.description: Berweuli Ala Carte is a restaurant located in Trabzon.
restaurants.address: Ortahisar Mah. Sarayatik Camii Sk. No: 20, 61040 Trabzon

restaurants.name: Rengarenk Balık Evi
restaurants.description: Rengarenk Balık Evi is a seafood restaurant located in Trabzon.

restaurants.name: Trabzon Şehir Kulübü
restaurants.description: Trabzon Şehir Kulübü is a diner located in Trabzon.
restaurants.address: uzun sok (nemlioglu cemal sok. no 1), Trabzon

restaurants.name: Buğra Burger Meydan
restaurants.description: Buğra Burger Meydan is a burger joint located in the city.
restaurants.address: Cumhuriyet Mahallesi Nemlioğlu Cemal Sokak (Uzun Sokak), 61000 Trabzon

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trabzon Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Trabzon Airport is used for flights within Turkey.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Trabzon Airport is used for flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
